remarks: The unit element of a ring is unique.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
statement:
ringcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ringcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ringideu $p |- ( R e. Ring -> E! u e. B A. x e. B ( ( u .x. x ) = x /\ ( x .x. u ) = x ) ) $.
$d .x. u x $.
$d B u x $.
$d B x $.
$d R u x $.
$d R x $.
